column1: '''Mr. Parish''' is a character in ''[[Leaf by Niggle]]''. He is the neighbour of [[Niggle]]
column2: and husband to [[Mrs. Parish]]. Parish is an old man
column3: who asks his neighbour to do several chores for him. Since Niggle is a nice fellow
column5: though he prefers to work on his painting. Parish never understood his art.

column1: '''1992: ''[[Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)|Tales from the Perilous Realm radio series]]''
